name: David Ramirez
text: Rest, fluids. For symptomatic relief, I like Nyquil, but I don't think that's available in the Philippines. You may need antibiotics if it's particularly bad.    The cold I got last month lasted for weeks--I may have had pneumonia at one point  =P
